content:
Plan	Benefit	Premium-EE (Employee Only)	Premium-EE (Employee + Spouse)	Employee- EE(Employee+ children	Employee EE- (Employee+ family)
Plan1-PPO 1000/2000 80%	$35/$50/$75/$100 copay and Rx copay of $15/45/60	$168.31/month	$572.25/month	$471.26/month	$875.30/month
Plan2-PPO 2500/5000 80%	$40/$60/$75/$100 copay and RX copay of $25/50/75	$151.05/month	$513.56/month	$422.94/month	$785.45/month
How to Enroll ?
	Fill out the attached EE enrollment form and return to insurance@itlize.com (Please physically Sign on the form).

Already enrolled ?
	If already enrolled in our current plan (PPO 1000/2000) & would like to move to (PPO 2500/5000)- Please send email to
insurance@itlize.com with “change to plan $2500”.
	If already enrolled in our current plan & wish to remain on same. No action required
	If you want to waive coverage for 2025. - Please fill the form as a waiver and send back to insurance@itlize.com.



Note : All the request for new enrollment, change of plan, waiving the insurance has to be sent out to insurance@itlize.com on	 or before  December 15th 2024	

-	The network to find doctors/facilities associated with our health plan will be United Choice Plus. To search for participating providers you can visit http://www.myuhc.com & find doctors under Choice Plus Plans
-	For benefits related questions, please reach out to our your Compensation and Benefits Manager at insurance@itlize.com she will reply to all inquiries
